author: USA TODAY, Josh Peter, USA TODAY
title: Cellphone towers attacked as conspiracy theory connecting 5G and coronavirus gains steam
description: Meanwhile celebrities such as Woody Harrelson and M.I.A. are sharing stories connecting 5G and health concerns on their social media accounts.
content:
There is a lot of misinformation out there about coronavirus. We sort the facts from falsehoods.
Wochit
An attack on cellphone towers in the United Kingdom over the weekend comes as conspiracy theory connecting 5G to the spread of coronavirus continue to ga… [+4314 chars]
